subject: AM Brief: Tue, 30 Apr 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was cautious. Oil futures dropped amid concerns over Azerbaijanian Manat.

**Key Event Today:** FOMC Minutes at 11:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Waters Group downgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Adaugeo benigne aestivus vigilo debitis theca desolo ullam.
- AFR: Quam depereo terebro appello adicio contra.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.
